channel.title: How do i turn server online
channel.description:
Ok so I changed the 127.0.0.1 in the client to my no-ip thing, now what do I do ?
What do I change server sided so my server can be up

item.title: How do i turn server online
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“Just Lurkin, post:14, topic:433452”]Use Hamachi…
Download it
Create a new network for your server on it
Change the no-ip or 127.0.0 to your Hamachi ip
Compile (don’t forget to change JDK version if necessary)
Run the source and done…
Friends also can play if they get Hamachi, join the network, and you give them a copy of your client to play it on.[/quote]
…Or learn how to use a router and port forward like a pro.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i turn server online

item.title: How do i turn server online
item.dc:creator: @Just_Lurkin Just Lurkin
item.description:
@Just_Lurkin wrote:

Use Hamachi…
Download it
Create a new network for your server on it
Change the no-ip or 127.0.0 to your Hamachi ip
Compile (don’t forget to change JDK version if necessary)
Run the source and done…
Friends also can play if they get Hamachi, join the network, and you give them a copy of your client to play it on.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i turn server online
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“whackatre, post:11, topic:433452”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=536171.msg3921047#msg3921047 date=1329703348]

also if router dont work, try Utorrent

google it, there are like 10000 tuts

DONT USE UTORRENT!!!. Just portforward normally. Thats the best way to do it.

hit ALT+F4 after you run the server.

haha
[/quote]
Why do people use uTorrent to portforward it’s stupid.[/quote]
Right? Its like using youtube to download movies. It works, Yes. But its not at all efficient.

item.title: How do i turn server online
item.dc:creator: @Crown2 Crown2
item.description:
@Crown2 wrote:

Make sure your client connects to 127.0.0.1 and if you made a client for others make it connect to your no-ip link
Use z-file search to find all of the places to change your ip it cant be in many different places depending on your base

Read full topic

item.title: How do i turn server online
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

you dont need to change anything server side for it to be up only thing for it to be up is portforwarding and the client ip changing to no-ip then making it a rar file with winrar then uploading it some where and registering the server on moparscape server status list
